title: Sunray
data:
{{obsolete}}

'''Sunray''' is a monsters-only [[Conjurations]] spell which deals damage on par with level 6 spells. It deals extra damage to [[vampire]]s, but cannot target [[invisible]] players. It is somewhat inaccurate, but ignores [[Repel Missiles]] and [[Deflect Missiles]].

The following monsters cast Sunray:
*[[Spriggan druid]]

==History==
Sunray was removed in [[0.14]].

[[Category:Monster spells]]
